Y do boys think love is a joke

Y do boys think love is a joke,
Idk,

I throw i found the right lad,
But i was wrong,

Sayin 2 my sis,
Its just a laugh,
It wont work out,
Its just some fun,

But y did he tell her n not me,
My sis keep it fm me,
But it got 2 a point,
Where she couldnt take it,
Any more,

I said 2 him,
Is this just a laugh 2 u,
Just some fun,

He said no,
He want it 2 work 2,

But not as much as me,

Idk wat 2 do,
He thinks its just one big game,
But its my heart,
He is playin wiv,

N my heart cn b brokin,
V easily,

Y do boys think love is a joke,
N not really love.

I dont like talkin bout my feelins

I dont like talkin,
Bout my feelins,

Its just me,
Never have done,
Never will do,

But y do ppl,
Say,
Talkin bout them will help u,
When it dosent,

Its like bf,
He dose my head in,
Sayin,
Talkin bout them,

But i dont like 2,

Every time i c him,
Its always,
Sayin how do u feel,
I say fuck all,

Coz i dont like talkin bout them,
But he goes,
On n on,
bout my feelins,

So wat if i talk bout them,

I like it like this way,
Just writin them down on ere,

Mayb coz i had a shit childhood,
But idk,

I dont like talkin,
bout my feelins,

N its stayin,
This way.

Y do ppl think best

Y do ppl think best,

No-one no's,
But y do they do tht,

Mayb its not best,
Or mayb it could b best,

But y do they think like tht,

Take my bf,
He think,
Its best 4 me 2 change,
But in wat way,

Some-time,
He tell me wat 2 wear,
He tell me tht i have 2 talk 2 him,
bout things,

But idk,

He is tryin 2 change me in 2 some-thing,
I dont want 2 b,

He should take me as i am,
He shouldnt want 2 change me,

But y,
Do ppl think its best,
2 change,

U cn change when u want,
Not coz they say so,

U cn change any time u want,
Not when ur say change nw,

U cn change when ur gd n ready 2,
Not coz they say so,

When ur ready,
U cn change,
So dont listen 2 them,

When the time is right,
U will change,
Not coz they said so,

Y do ppl think its best,
Idk,
Coz i am mot one of them,
ppl.

Y dose my bf mam think bad bout me

Y dose my bf mam,
Think bad bout me,

Idk y,

Its like when i was might 2 go blowin,
Wiv them,
On my bf dad's bday,

But my uncle got take 2 police station,
4 some-thing,

N he leave his dog outside,
The dog Sid is a Â£600 dog,

N it was like when i was in hospital,
After the car crash,
She was goin on n on,

Bout me not goin blowin them ,
My lil sis was there wiv me,
At hospital,

My sis said 2 me in my ear,
I dont like her,
Coz she is makin u look like the bad person,
Out of all this,

I said 2 my lil sis,
Yer i no,
I get it all the time,

So i couldnt go,
Wiv them,
N my bf new tht,

So his mam kick off,
But its not my fault,
N he new tht,

But he let his mam kick off,
At me,

N its like at new year,
His mam said no excuse,

She said 2 me,
U best come,
So dont b baby sittin,
Ur lil sis or the dog,

I was like wtf,

So wat if i was,
Its my life,
If i want 2 baby sit them,
I will,

But she dose my headin,
Goin,
On n on,
bout it,

She is not my mam,

So y do this,
2 me.

Y cnt i bn wiv the one i love

Y cnt i bn,
Wiv the one i love,

Y is tht,
No-one no's,

All i want is,
2 b wiv the person,
I love,

Is tht so hard 2 ask,
4,
Coz its not,

All i want is 2 b wiv the,
Person i love,

But i cnt b wiv him,
Coz i dont no if he feels,
The same way,

But,
I think he dose,

All i want is love in my life,
N tht one person,
Cn give me it,

He might no who he is,
But i am not sayin,
Coz he might do,

All i want is love,
N i want tht person,
2 give it 2 me.

I am gald u r out of my life

I am glad u r,
Out of my life,

Coz i dont have 2,
Wear wat u like,
Any more,

I cn wear,
Wat i like,
Like 2 wear nw,

I dont have 2 take off,
My rings,
Any more,

I cn wear them,
All nw,

I dont have 2 do,
Wat u say,
Nw,

I cn do,
Wat i want,
2 do,

I have on-one sayin,
2 me,
dont do tht,

I cn do,
wat i want,

I have no-one sayin,
Wear tht,

Coz i cn wear,
Wat i want,
2 wear,

I am glad u r,
out of mt life.

I am glad we r bk 2gether

I am glad,
We r bk 2gether,

We have learn,
Our lesson,

U have change,
Not tellin me wat,
2 do,

Not tellin me,
Wat 2 wear,

U have change,
In a gd way,
Not a bad way,

And tht is gd,
Tht u have change,

Coz i trust u,
Nw,

I trust u,
More then every,
Nw,

N i mean it,

I am gald,
We r bk 2gether.

I have missed u

I have missed u,
So much,

I have missed,
Talkin 2 u,

I have missed,
The txts,

I have missed,
The way u say,
I love u,

I have missed,
The hugs n kiss,
Fm u,

I have missed,
Everthin,
Bout u,

I am so happy,
We r bk 2gether,
Again,

I have missed u,
So much,

But i'll tell u,
One day,

How much u really,
Mean 2 me.

Wat i wood send u

Wat i wood,
Send u,

I wood send,
A kiss,
But how wood i no,
U have it,

I wood send,
Some flowers,
But how wood i no,
U have got them,
But them might b,
Dead by the time,
U have got them,

I wood send,
Somethin sweet,
But how wood i no,
U have it,
But it might of melted,
By the time u,
Have got it,

So i might aswell,
Send somethin else,
Like,

Me,

Then i no,
U have got it,

U will have everythin,
U wanted,

If i send,
Myself.

I love ya

I love ya,
So much,

But i wont tell ya,
But i'll show ya,

I wont say i love ya,
But i'll show ya,

If u say i love ya,
I will say it,

U mean so much 2 me,
But u no tht,

If u call me,
I will ask it,

It u txt me,
I'll txt ya bk,

I love ya,
So much,

But u no how much,
I love ya,

One day i'll tell ya,
How much ya mean 2 me,

N tell ya,
How much i love ya,

I love u,
So much,

N i'll do everythin,
2 b wiv ya,

I love ya,
baby.

As i lie ere in the darkness

As i lie ere,
In the darkness,

I think,
Bout life,
Idk y,

Just will do,
Coz its just me,

As i lie ere,
In the darkness,

I'll think bout,
me,

I wood b,
thinkin,

wat should i do,
Wiv life,

Wood the world,
B b a better place,
Wiv out me ere,

Or wood it b,
A better place,
Wiv me ere,

But idk,
I am still thinkin bout it,

I'll lie ere in the darkness,
I'll think,
N cry,

Bout life,

Y do i hurt

Y do i hurt,
So much,

Idk y,
I just do,

Everythin is hurtin me,
But idk in wat way,
It hurts,

I wish i could ask 4 help,
But i didnt need it,

I'll b ok,
In the end,

Y do i hurt,
So much,

Coz i wont tell ya,

Y do i hurt,

I idk,

So dont ask me,
Y do u hurt,
So much,

Coz i wont tell ya.

My heart feels like its breakin

My heart feels like its breakin,

Coz i have a lot 2 say,
But i cnt,

Coz ur not ere,
Wiv me,
But never mind,

Its just goin 2 w8,
Till i c ya,
But oooo well,

But i have 2 w8,
Till i c ya,

So i cn,
Tell ya,

Wat cn i do,
Idk,

I hate feelin like this,
But they is nottin i cn do,

Y dose my heart feel like this,
Idk,

But u might.
